post_detail.description:
Challenge:

ClickFire Media worked with Constellation to develop a new organizing principal for the client’s portfolio of businesses—evolving Crawford from a service provider to a solutions company.

Execution:

From Constellation's audit of management, clients and the brand we worked to translate the new value prop and strategy into an expression of the brand: identity online, touch screen kiosk and video.
post_detail.title: Crawford
